summary: Comprehensive testing of Taekwondo competition management application completed. Backend APIs mostly functional with one bracket generation issue. Frontend fully operational with successful authentication, navigation, and CRUD operations.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: [TypeError("'ObjectId' object is not iterable"), TypeError('vars() argument must have __dict__ attribute')]

passed_tests: Login form elements present and functional
Navigation between pages (Dashboard, Competitors, Categories, Combats)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in bracket generation endpoint (/api/combats/generer/{categorie_id}). The error occurs when trying to serialize MongoDB ObjectId objects to JSON. Consider using string IDs or proper serialization handling.
